== Ubuntu Open Week Spanish Translation ==

A group of spanish-speaking  LoCo team members were delighted to have attended the IRC workshops given by UBUNTU members regarding the UBUNTU OPEN WEEK. they have considered necesary to translate these into their mother tongue (Spanish) so even more members can benefit from these very valuable presentations.

== Do you want to help translating? ==

It is a mayor task to translate all of the transcrips. but together we can all chip in and make it look like a breeze.

Here is the list of workshops:

=== About the LOGS ===

To find the specific workshop you want to translate, you can click on the link below. locate the files in with the name ubuntu-classroom and the date of the workshop. eg "ubuntu-classroom-2006-11-27.html". this includes all the presentations from Monday, November 27th.

Here are the <nowiki>[[http://people.ubuntu.com/~fabbione/irclogs/|Logs]]</nowiki>

=== How can you help? ===

Please add your name to this list by editing the wiki if you feel like or send me an email efrain@ubuntu.org.ve...

The spanish-speaking community will thank you greatly.
